results.content:
actually the course is really a little bit challenging for complete beginner.

I recommend to try what in the course multiple time before doing the home work.

what I like is the logic and efficiency of the code writing.

what I don't like is the other narrator that talk to low and slow, not interactive at all

results.content: Crisp & Clear explain & quite challenging homework, was able to do it without looking into the fill in the blank's notebook. Looking forward to Advance the skills which i learnt. Thank you!
results.content_html: Crisp & Clear explain & quite challenging homework, was able to do it without looking into the fill in the blank's notebook. Looking forward to Advance the skills which i learnt. Thank you!

results.content: I really liked this course, Kirill is clear with concepts, and straightforward.  Not too long, not too short, perfect for beginners. I know when you're starting you want that 76+ hrs course, but that ends up being overwhelming. Do this one first.
results.content_html: I really liked this course, Kirill is clear with concepts, and straightforward. Not too long, not too short, perfect for beginners. I know when you're starting you want that 76+ hrs course, but that ends up being overwhelming. Do this one first.

results.content: This is a great course for people introducing code concepts in their lifes. The content and exercises are accurate to develop hard skills in python and apply the concepts learn in the course.
results.content_html: This is a great course for people introducing code concepts in their lifes. The content and exercises are accurate to develop hard skills in python and apply the concepts learn in the course.

results.content:
I learned Python from scratch to an advanced level. The course is well structured, complete, with exercises and tests.
The instructor has a clear and friendly voice that helps to better follow and understand the course.
results.content_html:

results.content: Nice course! Loved the focus on advanced visualizations that are very relevant for a data scientist to build the story!
results.content_html: Nice course! Loved the focus on advanced visualizations that are very relevant for a data scientist to build the story!

results.content: I loved the way this program has been structured. I would recommend this to anyone starting their journey in Python!!
results.content_html: I loved the way this program has been structured. I would recommend this to anyone starting their journey in Python!!

results.content: A little bit outdated. A lot of suddenly unexplained concepts in the Homework. I get that coding is ultimately about self learning by googling, but some concepts were just mentioned in the homework solutions with no context.
results.content_html: A little bit outdated. A lot of suddenly unexplained concepts in the Homework. I get that coding is ultimately about self learning by googling, but some concepts were just mentioned in the homework solutions with no context.

results.content:
I learned Python from scratch to an advanced level. The course is well structured, and complete, with exercises and tests.

The instructor was very clear with the concepts and showed different ways to apply seaborn functions, plots for visualization.

results.content: This is my first course on Python programming. The lectures were informative and easy to understand. Kudos to the team.
results.content_html: This is my first course on Python programming. The lectures were informative and easy to understand. Kudos to the team.

results.content: 90% of the homework assignments can be solved using copy-paste from the course material. The assignments are not challenging and don't test if you really understand what you're doing. Shallow overview course.
results.content_html: 90% of the homework assignments can be solved using copy-paste from the course material. The assignments are not challenging and don't test if you really understand what you're doing. Shallow overview course.

results.content:
This is a Great course on the subject!
Particularly, the section on Advanced Visualization is amazing - loved the double plot i.e. stripplot on top of boxplot!!
Thanks a ton!
